item.title: Podman Arr Stack
item.description:
run arr stack as rootless container in podman

what is arr stack

purpose of each

create dir

dir=/home/neo/arr-stack # hardcorded in script in some places mkdir -p $dir cd $dir

mkdir -p $dir/tvshows mkdir -p $dir/movies mkdir -p $dir/books mkdir -p $dir/transmission/downloads/complete/radarr mkdir -p $dir/transmission/downloads/complete/tv-sonarr mkdir -p $dir/transmission/downloads/incomplete/ mkdir -p $dir/transmission/watch mkdir -p $dir/prowler

Mount external harddrive

If despite uid=1000 options it keeps on mounting with root(uid=0) permissions, then try rebooting the system.

Manually mount external drive

mkdir -p $dir/external-drive lsblk sudo mount -t exfat -o users,noexec,uid=1000,gid=1000,context=“system_u:object_r:svirt_sandbox_file_t:s0” /dev/sda1 ~/arr-stack/external-drive
